title: U.S. and North Korea to Resume Nuclear Talks, Pyongyang Says
text:
SEOUL—North Korea said it would reconvene working-level talks with the U.S. on Saturday, reviving a denuclearization process that has been stalled since a February summit in Vietnam ended without a deal.

The two sides plan a preliminary meeting on Friday followed by official talks the next day, state media quoted First Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs Choe Son Hui as saying. Ms. Choe is one of leader Kim Jong Un’s most prominent interlocutors with the U.S. The state-media report on Tuesday didn’t specify where the negotiations...
description: North Korea said it would reconvene working-level talks with the U.S. on Saturday, reviving a denuclearization process that has been stalled since a February summit in Vietnam ended without a deal.
